name: tonx86
description: Educational x86-like assembly environment for VS Code

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/simcore && npm -ws run build
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.package: npm run build && cd packages/extension && npm run package
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run sync-version
scripts.postversion: git add packages/extension/package.json && git commit --amend --no-edit && git tag -d $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) && git tag v$(node scripts/get-version.js)
